channel.title: Dividend on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Dividend on FinanClub

item.title: CSCO
item.description: score:84 Chances: Cisco Systems (CSCO) settled at $50.08, representing a -0.85% change from its previous close. Cisco recently announced a dividend of $0.39 per share, payable on 2024-01-24. The outlook for CSCO stock depends on trends for cloud computing, plus corporate and telecom networks amid the shift to remote work.

item.title: KVUE
item.description: score:-39 Chances: Kenvue Inc. stock saw a 1.4% increase at the end of the after-hours trading session on December 13.The company reported a total dividend expense of $383 million from January to September. The favorable court ruling in a product-liability case resulted in a nearly 5% rise in Kenvue shares.

item.title: LU
item.description: score:73 Chances: Lufax Holding Ltd is a leading financial services enabler for small business owners in China The company announced its unaudited financial results for the third quarter, showing promising performance The change in the ADS Ratio could potentially benefit the company and its investors Risks: The reduction in dividend payment from the previous year raises concerns about the company’s financial health The potential US China war and rise of China could impact the company’s operations and growth prospects Score:73 chances characters count - risks characters count = -927
